translation.en: [Lady Whistledown] Grosvenor Square, 1813.
Dearest reader, the time has come to place our bets
translation.it: Cari lettori, è giunta l'ora di fare le nostre scommesse

translation.en: for the upcoming social season.
translation.it: per la nuova stagione di società.

translation.en: Consider the household of the Baron Featherington.
translation.it: Prendiamo la famiglia del Barone Featherington, ad esempio.

translation.en: Three misses foisted upon the marriage market
like sorrowful sows
by their tasteless…
translation.it: da una madre priva di gusto…

translation.en: Tighter.
…tactless mama.
-Tighter! -Is she to breathe, Mama?
I was able to squeeze my waist into the size of an orange and a half
translation.it: Io portavo corsetti del diametro di un'arancia,

translation.en: when I was Prudence's age.
Your sister shall do the same.
[Lady Whistledown] Far better odds might exist
in the household of the widowed Viscountess Bridgerton.
A shockingly prolific family,
noted for its bounty of perfectly handsome sons
translation.it: nota per l'abbondanza di bellissimi figli

translation.en: and perfectly beautiful daughters.
[groans] I am already roasting. Are you to complain the entire day, Eloise?
translation.it: - Ho già caldo. - Ti lamenterai tutto il giorno, Eloise?

translation.en: Surely I cannot be expected to bear these fashions the entire day.
translation.it: Si aspettano che indossi simili indumenti tutto il giorno?

translation.en: I feel like a princess. Do I look like one?
translation.it: Io mi sento una principessa. Ne ho l'aspetto?

translation.en: Do you truly wish to know what I think you look like?
-On your left! -Oh, Gregory!
Is our dear sister still not ready?
She's only been readying herself the entire night. You mean her entire life.
translation.it: - È tutta sera che si prepara. - Da tutta la vita, direi!

translation.en: I shall run upstairs and hasten her along.
-Colin, wait. I'll do it. -She likes me better than you, Benedict.
translation.it: Colin, no. Ci penso io. Preferisce me, Benedict.

translation.en: -Did she say that? -Everyone says that.
You must make haste!
Should you think she heard me?
[Lady Whistledown] How very perfect, indeed!
[Gregory] If you don't hurry up, we're going to be late.
Any sign of him yet?
Should your brother wish to be obeyed as Lord Bridgerton,
translation.it: Per essere obbedito come Lord Bridgerton,

translation.en: he must act as Lord Bridgerton.
translation.it: tuo fratello dovrà comportarsi come tale.

translation.en: Where is he, Benedict?
I do not know.
-Anthony! You are here. -Of course I am here, Sister.
translation.it: - Anthony, sei qui! - Ma certo, sorellina.

translation.en: I'd never miss such an important day for you and our family.
No, you would just be late for it.
Shall we?
[Lady Whistledown] Today is a most important day,
and for some a terrifying one,
for today is the day London's marriage-minded misses are presented
translation.it: perché oggi le fanciulle londinesi pronte alle nozze vengono presentate

translation.en: to Her Majesty the Queen.
May God have mercy on their souls.
translation.it: Che Dio abbia pietà di loro.

translation.en: Miss Philippa Featherington,
and Miss Penelope Featherington…
all presented by their mother, the Right Honorable Lady Featherington.
translation.it: Tutte presentate dalla loro madre, l'illustrissima Lady Featherington.

translation.en: [Lady Whistledown] It is only the queen's eye that matters today.
translation.it: Oggi conta solo lo sguardo della Regina.

translation.en: A glimmer of displeasure…
…and a young lady's value plummets to unthinkable depths.
translation.it: e il valore di una fanciulla crolla in un solo colpo.

translation.en: Miss Daphne Bridgerton,
presented by her mother,
the Right Honorable, the Dowager Viscountess Bridgerton.
Flawless, my dear.
-[whispering] Did that truly just happen? -[quietly] Keep smiling, dearest.
translation.it: È successo davvero? Sorridi, mia cara.

translation.en: They are watching you…
now more than ever.
[Lady Whistledown] But as we know, the brighter a lady shines,
translation.it: Ma come ben sappiamo, più una fanciulla brilla,

translation.en: the faster she may burn.
[Lady Whistledown] It has been said that, "Of all bitches dead or alive,
translation.it: È stato detto che "Tra tutte le cagne, in vita o già morte,

translation.en: a scribbling woman is the most canine."
translation.it: una scrittrice è la più cagna di tutte". STORIE DI SOCIETÀ

translation.en: If that should be true,
then this author would like to show you her teeth.
translation.it: la sottoscritta è pronta a mostrare i denti.

translation.en: My name is Lady Whistledown.
translation.it: Il mio nome è Lady Whistledown.

translation.en: You do not know me, and rest assured, you never shall.
translation.it: Voi non mi conoscete e, statene certi, non mi conoscerete mai.

translation.en: But be forewarned, dear reader,
I certainly know you.
-You absolutely sparkled, Sister. -[both giggle]
Come, now. I merely simpered and minced in a pretty dress like everyone else.
translation.it: Suvvia, ho solo sorriso tutta agghindata, come le altre.

translation.en: Not exactly like everyone else.
Oh, I shall need to go and visit with Penelope.
Her presentation was anything but… What was it the queen called you again?
translation.it: Lei non è stata… Come ti ha definita, la Regina?

translation.en: Flawless… or some such thing.
Trust I was astonished Her Majesty offered me,
translation.it: Non posso credere che Sua Maestà,

translation.en: out of 200 young ladies present, a most gracious remark.
translation.it: tra 200 fanciulle presenti, si sia complimentata proprio con me.

translation.en: Yes, it was quite a distinction.
And now 200 young ladies have a common adversary.
translation.it: E ora 200 fanciulle hanno un'avversaria in comune.

translation.en: -I wish you luck, Sister. -[Francesca] Eloise!
What? It is true.
My success on the marriage mart influences all of your prospects.
translation.it: Il mio successo influirà sulle vostre prospettive di nozze.

translation.en: We will all need to find love one day.
Indeed, a love as pure as what Mama and Papa once shared,
translation.it: E spero sia puro quanto quello che univa mamma a papà,

translation.en: if we are so fortunate.
I merely hope I am able to continue such a grand tradition.
translation.it: Ma posso solo sperare di tener viva la tradizione.

translation.en: Your dresses have arrived.
This one is quite ravishing.
Mary Edgecombe wore a similar shade last season.
translation.it: Mary Edgecombe ne ha indossato uno simile.

translation.en: And secured three offers the very next day, one from an earl.
translation.it: E ha ottenuto tre offerte. Anche da un conte!

translation.en: Mary Edgecombe, now the Countess of Fulton,
translation.it: Mary Edgecombe, ora Contessa di Fulton,

translation.en: apparently spent the last year living in a cottage
translation.it: ha passato tutto l'anno in un cottage

translation.en: hundreds of miles away from her earl. She is miserable. It says it all here.
translation.it: a centinaia di chilometri dal suo conte. È disperata. È tutto scritto qui.

translation.en: Do not tell me that is yet another scandal sheet. Eloise--
translation.it: Un altro dei tuoi giornali scandalistici?

translation.en: No, no, this one is different. This one lists subjects by name, in full.
translation.it: No, questo è diverso. Questo fa nomi e cognomi.

translation.en: -[gasps] Let me see! -Wait. Wait!
-"Lady Whistledown." -"Lady Whistledown"?
-[Eloise] The author. -[Violet] Do we know a Lady Whistledown?
Surely Lady Whistledown cannot be her true name.
translation.it: Non può essere il suo vero nome.

translation.en: What does it say, dearest?
She loathes the fact that we've been named alphabetically, oldest to youngest.
translation.it: Odia che i nostri nomi siano in ordine alfabetico.

translation.en: -Your father and I found it orderly. -Lady Whistledown finds "banality."
translation.it: - Ci è sembrato ordinato. - A lei sembra "banale".

translation.en: The papers were distributed across town today without charge.
translation.it: È stato distribuito gratis in tutta la città.

translation.en: Without charge? What kind of author--
Well, at least she has one thing right.
She has named Daphne as the season's Incomparable.
She calls you a "diamond of the first water."
Well, how lovely!
[Lady Featherington] I should not be surprised
translation.it: Non mi stupirei, se questa Whistledown fosse in realtà proprio Violet Bridgerton.

translation.en: if this Whistledown is revealed to be Violet Bridgerton herself.
translation.it: se questa Whistledown fosse in realtà proprio Violet Bridgerton.

translation.en: These pages certainly report on the viscountess's family
with much indulgence, indeed.
The pages report nothing but the truth, Lady Featherington.
translation.it: Contengono solo la verità, Lady Featherington.

translation.en: Daphne has bloomed exquisitely,
and the sooner she is taken from the market,
the better for the other young ladies…
translation.it: meglio sarà per tutte le altre.

translation.en: even ones prone to hysterics in front of the queen.
translation.it: Anche per quelle inclini agli isterismi di fronte alla Regina.

translation.en: Ladies, hurry with your miniatures before our guest arrives.
translation.it: Finite le miniature prima che arrivi l'ospite.

translation.en: And, Penelope, put down that book at once.
translation.it: E posa subito quel libro, Penelope.

translation.en: You shall confuse your thoughts.
[Lady Cowper] So…
tell me about this cousin. Joining you for the entire season?
translation.it: ditemi di questa cugina. Si fermerà per l'intera stagione?

translation.en: She is a distant cousin of my husband,
translation.it: È una lontana cugina di mio marito.

translation.en: and with no close female relative to sponsor her debut,
translation.it: Senza parenti femmine per patrocinarne il debutto,

translation.en: Lord Featherington has directed me to take her in for charity.
translation.it: Lord Featherington mi ha chiesto di farle la carità.

translation.en: Hmm. You are known to be quite charitable.
translation.it: Siete nota per il vostro animo caritatevole.

translation.en: Precisely what this new rumormonger should have published,
translation.it: Come avrebbe dovuto scrivere quella pettegola,

translation.en: instead of erroneously specifying
that I shall only have three young ladies under my care this year.
translation.it: che quest'anno mi occuperò di tre sole fanciulle.

translation.en: She knows nothing.
Unless you shall like to have only three young ladies under your care.
translation.it: A meno che non vogliate occuparvi di tre sole fanciulle.

translation.en: I should gladly sit this season out.
Penelope is quite nervous. This shall be her very first season.
translation.it: Penelope è alquanto tesa. Sarà la sua prima stagione.

translation.en: I am not nervous, Mama.
What she is is two stone heavier than she ought to be.
translation.it: No, è solo dieci chili in sovrappeso.

translation.en: Mm, those blemishes on her face are quite difficult to conceal.
translation.it: E le macchie sul viso sono difficili da celare.

translation.en: Perhaps some arsenic and lead might help.
translation.it: Magari un po' di arsenico e piombo?

translation.en: Should you allow me to delay only a year, just as Lady Bridgerton has done for Eloise,
translation.it: Se permetteste che aspetti un anno, come Lady Bridgerton con Eloise,

translation.en: I may remain dedicated to my studies, perhaps.
The answer is no, Penelope.
You may wish to listen to her, my lady.
Shepherding four young ladies
through these endless rounds of affairs at the same time…
translation.it: in quest'infinita serie di impegni contemporaneamente…

translation.en: [scoffs] Can you imagine the competition?
Well, how much competition can this cousin provoke?
translation.it: Quanta concorrenza potrà mai causare, questa cugina?

translation.en: She came of age on a farm, she has a mere four-figure dowry,
translation.it: È cresciuta in una fattoria e ha una misera dote.

translation.en: and as for her appearance…
Well, let us hope Miss Thompson is more presentable
translation.it: Beh, speriamo che Miss Thompson sia più presentabile

translation.en: than the legions of unkempt animals she has spent her entire life -tending to back home. [laughs] -Mm.
translation.it: della moltitudine di bestie scarmigliate che ha passato la vita ad accudire.

translation.en: Lord Featherington's cousin has arrived, madam.
translation.it: La cugina di Lord Featherington, signora.

translation.en: [gasps] Now, remember to be kind, ladies…
and charitable.
The poor are our burden.
She's beautiful.
Good afternoon, Lady Featherington.
Well, if this is not a sight for my sore eyes!
My condolences, Your Grace, for your father.
translation.it: Condoglianze, Vostra Grazia, per vostro padre.

translation.en: -Very kind of you. -Kind of me?
You hated the man.
It is so wonderful to see you, Lady Danbury.
Words I do not hear often enough.
translation.it: Non me lo sento dire spesso.

translation.en: Come.
You must excuse the, uh, disorderliness.
As you know, I'm to host a ball this evening.
translation.it: Come sapete, questa sera terrò un ballo.

translation.en: Yes.
I have managed to keep the details of your return quiet.
translation.it: Non ho divulgato la notizia del vostro rientro.

translation.en: But when those vulgar mamas discover
that there is an eligible duke present at tonight's fete,
translation.it: sapranno che alla festa vi sarà un duca scapolo,

translation.en: I shall be able to keep such a secret no longer.
translation.it: mi sarà impossibile mantenere il segreto.

translation.en: That is what I was hoping to discuss.
I have only returned to London to deal with my late father's affairs.
translation.it: Sono qui per occuparmi degli affari di mio padre.

translation.en: I'm afraid it leaves me no time to… socialize.
translation.it: Temo di non aver tempo per… socializzare.

translation.en: And so, whilst I appreciate your most gracious invitation,
translation.it: Per quanto apprezzi il vostro cortese invito,

translation.en: Lady Danbury, I must ask you to accept my regrets.
translation.it: Lady Danbury, dovrete accettare le mie scuse.

translation.en: Your regrets…
are denied.
-I suppose a brief appearance-- -Excellent.
You may leave that flask you carry at home.
translation.it: E lasciate a casa la fiaschetta.

translation.en: Most undignified.
Someone may hear us, my lord.
One day, I shall seize that watch and take it apart bit by bit.
translation.it: Un giorno ti prendo quell'orologio e lo faccio a pezzetti.

translation.en: That belonged to my father.
Should it disappear, I would miss it sadly.
Then you shall know precisely how I feel…
translation.it: Allora saprai esattamente come mi sento io…

translation.en: every time you disappear.
Stay with me today.
I'm afraid I cannot.
I must chaperone my sister at the Danbury ball this evening.
translation.it: Devo accompagnare mia sorella al ballo di Lady Danbury.

translation.en: -Daphne, yes? -Mm.
What might they be like,
these grand affairs your sister must attend?
translation.it: questi importanti eventi cui partecipa tua sorella?

translation.en: You… would hate them.
-[chuckles] -Every eligible lady of breeding dressed in some lavishly trimmed frock,
translation.it: Fanciulle nubili e d'alto lignaggio agghindate in abiti esagerati,

translation.en: bloodthirsty mamas at their sides…
translation.it: madri assetate di sangue al loro fianco

translation.en: …and wary fathers making arrangements for only the most advantageous of matches.
translation.it: e padri diffidenti interessati soltanto alle accoppiate più vantaggiose.

translation.en: And of course, without my father here, that responsibility… falls upon me.
translation.it: Ma non essendoci più mio padre, la responsabilità spetta a me.

translation.en: A significant duty, no doubt.
Someone must guard my poor sister from the bucks and pinks,
translation.it: La mia sorellina va protetta da maschi poco raccomandabili,

translation.en: ensure her virtue remains free of any kind of defilement.
translation.it: così che la sua virtù non sia violata.

translation.en: Daphne is fortunate.
Every woman is not afforded such gallant protection.
translation.it: Non tutte le donne godono di tale protezione.

translation.en: Every woman is not a lady.
Of course not, my lord.
You have me…
protecting you too.
I will always protect you.
[Lady Whistledown] The season's opening ball at Danbury House
translation.it: Il primo ballo di stagione, a Danbury House,

translation.en: is a most highly sought-after invitation, indeed,
for every darling debutante
from Park Lane to Regent Street will be on display.
translation.it: da Park Lane a Regent Street sarà lì in bella mostra.

translation.en: [Lady Whistledown] Titled, chaste, and innocent,
this is what they have been raised and trained for since birth.
translation.it: questo è ciò per cui sono addestrate dalla nascita.

translation.en: Tonight, we shall discover
which young ladies might succeed at securing a match,
translation.it: quali fanciulle riusciranno ad accaparrarsi un compagno,

translation.en: thereby avoiding the dreadful, dismal condition known as "the spinster."
translation.it: evitando pertanto il supremo disonore di restare zitelle.

translation.en: Oh, I do love to dance.
Do you like my flower? We grow them in our very own garden.
translation.it: Vi piace il mio fiore? È del nostro giardino.

translation.en: I must show you my watercolors sometime, if you desire to see them.
translation.it: Vi mostrerò i miei acquarelli, qualora vi facesse piacere.

translation.en: And she is quite proficient on the pianoforte too.
[Lady Cowper] Is that not the young lady who was caught with her gentleman last year
translation.it: Non è la fanciulla sorpresa l'anno scorso con un gentiluomo

translation.en: in Lady Mottram's conservatory, unchaperoned?
translation.it: nel giardino d'inverno di Lady Mottram, non accompagnata?

translation.en: She's lucky her gentleman agreed to a hasty marriage after she went and ruined herself.
translation.it: Le è andata bene che l'abbia sposata, dopo che si era rovinata la reputazione.

translation.en: Lightskirts.
They're all staring, Mother.
Allow them to come to you, dearest.
translation.it: Aspetta che si presentino loro, cara.

translation.en: Look who's already setting his cap at Miss Bridgerton.
translation.it: Guardate chi ha posato lo sguardo su Miss Bridgerton.

translation.en: Lady Bridgerton, Miss Bridgerton.
I believe you have already been introduced to my daughter Daphne, Lord Ambrose.
translation.it: Avete già incontrato mia figlia Daphne, Lord Ambrose.

translation.en: Uh, yes. We met at your brother's levee.
If I recall, my lord, you had just won your first race at Newmarket.
translation.it: Avevate appena vinto la vostra prima gara a Newmarket.

translation.en: His first and only, I believe.
Well, in that case,
let us hope his lordship has found himself a new horse.
translation.it: spero vi siate procurato un cavallo nuovo.

translation.en: I haven't had the pleasure of seeing you at our club lately, Ambrose.
translation.it: Non ho più avuto il piacere di vederti al club.

translation.en: Should it have anything to do with the unpaid balance you left on our betting books winter last?
translation.it: Non sarà per caso per i debiti insoluti dall'inverno scorso?

translation.en: Ambrose is a cheat.
A man of any honor ensures his debts are fully paid.
translation.it: Un uomo d'onore paga sempre i propri debiti.

translation.en: I did not realize…
Well, how could you have done? It is the very reason I am here, Sister.
translation.it: Come avresti potuto? È proprio per questo che sono qui.

translation.en: Let us take a turn about the room.
He is rather pleasing.
He is rather here to shuffle about hunting fortunes.
translation.it: E alquanto interessato alle fortune altrui.

translation.en: Trust Mr. Lewis knows of your sizable dowry. Leave him be.
translation.it: Il sig. Lewis sa della tua ingente dote. Lascialo perdere.

translation.en: -I presume you know of him too? -Mr. Worthington. Second son.
We shall find better.
He is of dubious parentage.
I shall not have you making a life with a poet, heaven forbid.
translation.it: Non puoi sposare un poeta, che Dio ce ne scampi.

translation.en: Nor an eccentric.
My word!
If the only gentlemen present this evening are your brothers,
translation.it: Se gli unici gentiluomini virtuosi sono i tuoi fratelli,

translation.en: then we're in a great deal of trouble, indeed.
You continue to say "we."
Did Mother tell you yet? About my tour? I'm to begin in Greece.
translation.it: Mamma vi ha detto del mio viaggio? Comincerò dalla Grecia.

translation.en: -Greece? How adventurous, Colin! -On guard!
translation.it: - Grecia? Molto temerario, Colin! - In guardia!

translation.en: Too late.
I already noted you.
-Lady Danbury. -Good evening.
Miss Bridgerton, you look rather lovely this evening.
translation.it: Miss Bridgerton, vi trovo incantevole, questa sera.

translation.en: Is there a reason I've yet to see you on the dance floor?
translation.it: Per quale motivo non avete ancora ballato?

translation.en: All in good time, Lady Danbury.
You poor thing.
Who is that?
I'm sure I've never seen her.
Miss Marina Thompson, a distant cousin of my husband's.
translation.it: Miss Marina Thompson, lontana cugina di mio marito.

translation.en: She's rather dowdy, is she not?
One of the Bridgerton boys is joining the swarm.
translation.it: Uno dei Bridgerton si è unito al gruppo.

translation.en: Well!
[Lady Cowper] Most telling!
I imagine your household will be a hive of callers in the morning…
translation.it: Casa vostra sarà invasa dalle visite, domani mattina.

translation.en: Where one suitor goes, the rest will surely follow.
translation.it: Dove va un pretendente, vanno tutti gli altri.

translation.en: Excuse me.
The duke. I would recognize him anywhere.
-Mama, where are you taking us? -To meet the duke.
translation.it: - Dove ci portate? - A conoscere il duca.

translation.en: That man is not in our miniatures.
translation.it: Non è tra le nostre miniature.

translation.en: Make haste before he should see Miss Thompson.
translation.it: Veloci, prima che noti Miss Thompson.

translation.en: Your Grace.
Let me introduce my daughters, Miss Prudence Featherington,
translation.it: Le mie figlie, Miss Prudence Featherington,

translation.en: I'm quite parched.
I shall fetch you a glass of lemonade.
No. You have already done so much for me tonight.
translation.it: No. Hai già fatto fin troppo, questa sera.

translation.en: I shall return in a mere moment.
Small glasses.
-Lord Berbrooke. -Tiny little things, are they not?
The glasses? I suppose.
Then the matter is settled.
I'm not entirely sure the matter in which we discuss, my lord.
translation.it: Temo di non capire di cosa stiamo parlando, milord.

translation.en: You've always amused me, Miss Bridgerton,
translation.it: Mi avete sempre divertito, Miss Bridgerton.

translation.en: ever since I was a schoolboy, and you were…
translation.it: Da quand'ero uno scolaretto e voi avevate…

translation.en: All but… five?
My brother, he summons me. -Ah. [chuckles] -Adieu.
A moment, please! [chuckles]
-[gasps] Pardon me. -Forgive me.
Ah, yes. Wait just one second, thank you.
Tell me your name.
Your name, sir?
Am I honestly to believe you do not already know my name?
translation.it: Volete farmi credere di non saperlo?

translation.en: [low] One moment. Yes, yes. Oh, hello.
If you desired an introduction, madam,
I do believe accosting me to be the least civilized of ways.
Accosting you?
Truly, they will try anything.
Sir, that is not… This is not…
-What is your name? -[Anthony] Basset.
-Bridgerton! -Come here, old friend!
I heard news of your father.
-Deuce take it, you are no longer Basset. -I shall--
Hastings! The Duke of Hastings, now known for evermore.
translation.it: Hastings! Il Duca di Hastings, ora e per sempre.

translation.en: The Duke of Hastings, is it?
-Right, Hastings, this is my sister. -Your sister?
translation.it: - Hastings, lei è mia sorella. - Tua sorella?

translation.en: Daphne, Hastings and I know each other from our days at Oxford,
translation.it: Daphne, Hastings ed io ci siamo conosciuti a Oxford.

translation.en: days we shall not soon forget.
Yes. As I am well aware of the company you keep, brother,
translation.it: Certo. Conoscendo le tue amicizie, fratello mio,

translation.en: I am certain your days with His Grace were most civilized, indeed.
translation.it: il periodo passato con Sua Grazia sarà stato indubbiamente edificante.

translation.en: Hastings, we shall need to get together properly.
-I expect to see you at our club, then. -Indeed.
Evening, Bridgerton. Miss Bridgerton.
Daphne, I believe Lord Wetherby is looking for you to dance.
translation.it: Daphne, Lord Wetherby ti cerca per un ballo.

translation.en: -Is he? -If only it weren't time for us to retire.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Purtroppo è ora di rientrare.

translation.en: Daphne's anything but weary. I shall stay with her.
translation.it: Daphne non è stanca. Resto io con lei.

translation.en: -That would be lovely. -Daphne…
there is nary a gentleman here who would not take your hand.
translation.it: non c'è gentiluomo che non voglia prenderti la mano.

translation.en: You must think about this.
The most perfect thing to do now is not to dance,
translation.it: La mossa perfetta non è ballare,

translation.en: but to leave them all wanting more.
If anyone knows how this works, it is your eldest brother.
translation.it: Se c'è qualcuno che se ne intende, è tuo fratello maggiore.

translation.en: Perhaps he is right.
Let us go.
Miss! You've already awakened!
Have Cook prepare as many biscuits as he can this morning.
translation.it: Chiedi al cuoco più biscottini, questa mattina.

translation.en: Perhaps we might move a few extra chairs into the drawing room too.
translation.it: E magari è il caso di portare altre sedie in salotto.

translation.en: I do wonder which gentleman will be the very first to call.
translation.it: Mi chiedo chi sarà a farci visita per primo.

translation.en: I have so much to ask of them all.
Well, let us get you dressed.
I did not expect to see you here this morning.
It is terribly early for you, dearest.
I could not sleep for some reason. All the excitement, I presume.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a dormire. Immagino sia per l'emozione.

translation.en: Am I the first gentleman to arrive?
How wonderful!
Callers, ma'am. The Earl of Stafford and the Marquess of Finley.
translation.it: Signora, il Duca di Stafford e il Marchese di Finley.

translation.en: My word! Well, you should have my colorful fashions to thank.
translation.it: Cielo! Dovrete ringraziare quegli abiti sgargianti.

translation.en: [clears throat] For a Miss Marina Thompson.
[Lady Whistledown] Dearest reader, this author finds herself
translation.it: Carissimi lettori, questa autrice non può fare a meno di condividere inaspettate novità.

translation.en: compelled to share the most curious of news.
translation.it: questa autrice non può fare a meno di condividere inaspettate novità.

translation.en: And do you have a large family, too, my lord?
It seems our diamond requires a closer inspection.
translation.it: Pare che il nostro diamante richieda un'analisi più attenta.

translation.en: Is there a problem, Lord Bridgerton?
I should think so. You are in my seat.
translation.it: Direi di sì. Sei seduto al mio posto.

translation.en: As such, an even rarer jewel
of only the most remarkable brilliance, fire, and luster has been unearthed.
translation.it: di eccezionale lustro e brillantezza, è stato trovato.

translation.en: Her name, unknown to most, yet soon known to all,
translation.it: Il suo nome, sconosciuto ai più ma presto noto a tutti,

translation.en: is Miss Marina Thompson.
Should you not be out on your daily walk about the square, dear?
translation.it: Non dovresti fare la tua passeggiata, caro?

translation.en: It appears as though it may rain.
This author is left to wonder whether Her Majesty might reconsider
translation.it: Questa autrice si chiede se Sua Maestà sia pronta a riesaminare

translation.en: the high praise she once afforded Miss Bridgerton…
translation.it: gli elogi offerti tempo fa a Miss Bridgerton…

translation.en: for we all must know what the queen despises more than anything…
translation.it: perché sappiamo bene quale sia la cosa che la regina odia di più:

translation.en: Being wrong.
And the drawing room at Bridgerton House currently appears to be emptier
translation.it: E il salotto di Bridgerton House sembrerebbe più vuoto

translation.en: than the muddled head of her dearest King George.
translation.it: della confusa testolina del suo amato Re Giorgio.

translation.en: Well, I must be off to my club, then.
Sisters. Mother.
It follows that Lady Featherington is to receive what she has always desired:
translation.it: Pertanto Lady Featherington ha ottenuto ciò che ha sempre desiderato:

translation.en: the season's true Incomparable living under her own roof.
translation.it: la vera "incomparabile" della stagione sotto il proprio tetto.

translation.en: She must be overjoyed.
Is Miss Thompson so high in her instep that she's unable to don her own slippers?
translation.it: Miss Thompson non è forse in grado di infilarsi le scarpe da sola?

translation.en: I should think not.
Has anyone else read what Lady Whistledown has written of late?
Should anyone pay any heed to what Lady Whistledown writes of late?
translation.it: Dovremmo prestare attenzione a quel che scrive?

translation.en: I certainly do not.
Mama, perhaps we might attend the upcoming Salisbury ball by ourselves
translation.it: Mamma, forse dovremmo andare al ballo dai Salisbury da sole.

translation.en: and the Merriweather tea too.
I believe that Anthony has already replied on our behalf, dearest.
translation.it: Temo che Anthony abbia già risposto per noi, mia cara.

translation.en: Apparently, he has managed our social calendar through June.
translation.it: Ci ha organizzato l'agenda fino a giugno.

translation.en: He'll be there for the entire season?
translation.it: Ci sarà per tutta la stagione?

translation.en: Lady Whistledown has made her opinion of our dear sister's fortunes quite clear.
translation.it: Lady Whistledown non ha dubbi sul destino di nostra sorella.

translation.en: Oh, enough about Lady Whistledown!
A caller for Miss Bridgerton.
The Lord Berbrooke.
Um… Uh… Come in! May I help you to some freshly prepared biscuits?
translation.it: Accomodatevi. Gradite dei biscottini appena sfornati?

translation.en: Eloise, allow some room for his lordship, will you?
Eloise, are you not due for a visit with Penelope this morning?
translation.it: Eloise, non dovevi far visita a Penelope?

translation.en: -I believe I should like to stay. -I believe you should like to go.
translation.it: Credo che resterò. Credo che ci andrai.

translation.en: Forgive me for not calling sooner.
translation.it: Scusate se non sono passato prima.

translation.en: I presumed your affections were already engaged.
Now I know.
You and I were destined for each other.
And so, by Heaven, your love may burn
translation.it: E sia. Divampa l'amor per voi dal profondo dell'anima mia.

translation.en: from the depths of my soul.
translation.it: Divampa l'amor per voi dal profondo dell'anima mia.

translation.en: 'Tis thee I shall earn.
Wonderful, wonderful. Gentlemen, thank you for your calls.
Do not forget to bid Prudence, Philippa, or even Penelope farewell as you go.
translation.it: Non dimenticate di salutare Prudence, Philippa o persino Penelope.

translation.en: -A most wretched sonnet, indeed. -Lord Byron he is not.
translation.it: - Pessimo sonetto. - Non è certo Lord Byron!

translation.en: I do not believe so. Good day, Pen.
Lord Berbrooke is harmless. There will be others.
translation.it: Lord Berbrooke è innocuo. Ce ne saranno altri.

translation.en: Lady Whistledown has all but declared me ineligible…
translation.it: Lady Whistledown mi ha ormai dichiarata non idonea.

translation.en: worthy of the affection of a detestable simpleton
translation.it: Degna solo di un odioso sempliciotto

translation.en: and no one else.
Tell me, what others should ever want such damaged goods now?
translation.it: Chi mai vorrebbe della merce danneggiata, ormai?

translation.en: [Anthony] You speak as if Lady Whistledown were to be held in higher regard than Her Majesty the Queen herself.
translation.it: Come se Lady Whistledown godesse di maggior considerazione di Sua Maestà.

translation.en: You give far too much credit to some anonymous scribbler.
translation.it: Non dar peso a quell'anonima scribacchina.

translation.en: These musings, they're not true.
translation.it: Nelle sue riflessioni non vi è nulla di vero.

translation.en: Only they are true, Brother, and they are true because of you.
translation.it: Invece sì. Ed è per colpa tua.

translation.en: You have managed to scare every worthy suitor away.
translation.it: Sei riuscito a spaventare ogni singolo pretendente.

translation.en: Whistledown has merely reported it.
I am looking out for you. I am protecting you.
translation.it: Mi prendo cura di te, ti proteggo.

translation.en: -It is my duty. -And what of my duty?
translation.it: - È mio dovere. - E che ne è del mio?

translation.en: You have no idea what it is to be a woman…
translation.it: Non sai cosa significhi essere donna.

translation.en: what it might feel like
to have one's entire life reduced to a single moment.
translation.it: a giocarsi l'esistenza in un solo momento.

translation.en: This is all I have been raised for.
This… is all I am.
translation.it: Sono stata cresciuta apposta. Questo… è tutto ciò che sono. Non ho altro valore.

translation.en: I have no other value.
translation.it: è tutto ciò che sono. Non ho altro valore.

translation.en: If I am unable to find a husband, I shall be worthless.
translation.it: Senza un marito, sarei del tutto inutile.

translation.en: Daphne, you're a Bridgerton.
[scoffs] It would be easier if I were not.
Go on.
[Lady Whistledown] Ambitious mamas rejoice,
for the new Duke of Hastings continues to grace our fair city with his presence.
translation.it: Il Duca di Hastings continua a onorare la nostra città della sua presenza.

translation.en: And, oh, what an impressive presence it is!
Lady Whistledown has written about you again, Your Grace.
translation.it: Lady Whistledown ha di nuovo scritto di voi.

translation.en: Would you like to read it?
It should be noted
that the duke has been overheard announcing to mamas everywhere
translation.it: che il duca è stato sentito annunciare a tutte le madri del Paese

translation.en: that he has no plans of ever marrying.
translation.it: di non aver alcuna intenzione di sposarsi.

translation.en: This author wonders which brazen matchmaker shall rise to such a challenge,
translation.it: Mi chiedo quale sfrontata intermediaria sia pronta a raccogliere la sfida,

translation.en: for this competition is well underway.
translation.it: visto che la gara è ormai iniziata.

translation.en: You know, I do suppose if it were not for an overzealous mother at every corner,
translation.it: Se non fosse per tutte queste madri ossessionate,

translation.en: this time of year in the city would not be so very dreadful.
translation.it: la città non è poi tremenda, di questa stagione.

translation.en: Those mothers simply want the same as you, I rather think.
translation.it: Quelle madri vogliono quello che vuoi tu, no?

translation.en: For every last one of them to choke on their daughters' hair ribbons?
translation.it: Che si strozzino tutte con i fiocchetti delle figlie?

translation.en: For you to claim a wife, Hastings.
Are you not planning on taking your place in society when you have a dukedom?
translation.it: Intendi seriamente non sposarti nonostante il tuo ducato?

translation.en: I have a title, which, as far as I'm concerned, will end with me.
translation.it: Ho solo un titolo. Destinato a morire con me.

translation.en: -But Hastings-- -Stop calling me that.
It was my father's name. Never mine.
translation.it: Era il nome di mio padre. Non il mio.

translation.en: And in any case, what of you?
What of me?
You are the firstborn Bridgerton of a firstborn Bridgerton,
translation.it: Sei il primogenito di un primogenito

translation.en: nine times over. Where is your wife?
translation.it: da nove generazioni. Tua moglie dov'è?

translation.en: [waiter] Right away, sir.
Oh! Is your plan to fuck her forever, your mistress?
translation.it: Intendi fottertela per sempre? La tua amante.

translation.en: You shall need to sire an heir.
translation.it: Devi mettere al mondo un erede.

translation.en: I'm in possession of something that you are not.
translation.it: Io posseggo una cosa che tu non hai.

translation.en: Brothers.
[Lady Whistledown] It has reached my ears
that Mr. Colin Bridgerton shall be awarded the year's grand prize
translation.it: che sarà il sig. Colin Bridgerton a conquistarsi il gran premio,

translation.en: when he sweeps Miss Thompson off her pretty little slippered feet.
translation.it: quando farà innamorare la graziosissima Miss Thompson.

translation.en: You could always send the willow back to that farm, madam.
translation.it: Potreste rimandare la concupita alla fattoria, signora.

translation.en: As if Lord Featherington would ever allow that.
translation.it: Lord Featherington non lo permetterebbe mai.

translation.en: [Lady Whistledown] In other news,
a most peculiar suitor for Miss Daphne Bridgerton has emerged.
translation.it: per Miss Daphne Bridgerton si è fatto avanti un insolito pretendente.

translation.en: Daphne…
[clears throat] Your caller.
Will it be just the two of us…
yet again?
-Our box, Mama? -Mm-hmm.
Lady Bridgerton!
Do join us.
Your Majesty, good evening.
You must remember my daughter, Daphne.
Yes.
She made quite an impression…
however fleeting it may have been. [snorting chuckle]
I would like to welcome you both to my box this evening.
translation.it: Mi farebbe piacere avervi nel mio palchetto, questa sera.

translation.en: I insist.
They are saying her husband will not live till the end of the month.
translation.it: Si dice che il marito morrà prima della fine del mese.

translation.en: Surely another rumor provided by that vicious, scandal-mongering writer.
translation.it: Sarà un'altra diceria di quella giornalista da strapazzo.

translation.en: Should her degradation know no bounds?
translation.it: La sua diffamazione non ha limiti?

translation.en: Lady Whistledown writes about my family too.
translation.it: Lady Whistledown scrive anche della mia famiglia.

translation.en: Yet I suppose the duke can withstand such scrutiny,
translation.it: Ma il duca può reggere un simile esame,

translation.en: since he is, after all, a man.
His Grace was fortunate to have you there with him as a child
translation.it: Sua Grazia ebbe la fortuna di avervi accanto da bambino,

translation.en: after what happened to his mother. Awful!
translation.it: con quel che accadde a sua madre. Che orrore!

translation.en: -He is not what Whistledown writes. -Nor is Daphne.
translation.it: - Non è come dice la Whistledown. - Nemmeno Daphne.

translation.en: It would seem the two of them have that much in common, then.
translation.it: Pare abbiano molto in comune, allora.

translation.en: Matches have certainly been made with far less.
translation.it: Altri matrimoni sono stati combinati per molto meno.

translation.en: What are you suggesting?
Lady Whistledown merely writes what she sees.
translation.it: Lady Whistledown scrive solo di ciò che vede.

translation.en: Perhaps we need to help her to see things a bit more clearly.
translation.it: Forse è il caso di aiutarla a vedere meglio.

translation.en: The duke is quite fond of gooseberry pie.
translation.it: Al duca piace molto la crostata di uva spina.

translation.en: The very dish my cook is renowned for.
translation.it: Proprio il piatto forte del mio cuoco.

translation.en: For all we know, Whistledown may be some interloper living in Bloomsbury, of all places.
translation.it: Magari la Whistledown non è che una ficcanaso di Bloomsbury.

translation.en: What should be so terrible about Bloomsbury?
That people there actually work for a living?
translation.it: Il fatto che la gente lavori?

translation.en: She does seem to be someone with access.
-Who knows if Whistledown is even a she? -[Anthony] Fair point.
translation.it: - Chi ci dice che è una donna? - Giusto.

translation.en: Because she is simply too good to be anyone but a man?
translation.it: È troppo brava per non essere un uomo?

translation.en: Well, I think it rather obvious that the writer is Lady Danbury.
translation.it: A me sembra ovvio che si tratti di Lady Danbury.

translation.en: Lady Danbury enjoys sharing her insults with society directly.
translation.it: Lady Danbury adora elargire insulti direttamente.

translation.en: She would never bother herself writing them all down.
translation.it: Perché prendersi la briga di scriverli?

translation.en: Could it be Lady Featherington?
You have yet to read what Whistledown writes of the Featheringtons, little sister.
translation.it: Non hai letto ciò che scrive dei Featherington.

translation.en: You must forgive this rather unruly debate, Your Grace.
translation.it: Perdonate il disordinato dibattito, Vostra Grazia.

translation.en: -Nonsense. I find it entertaining. -Oh! [chuckles]
All of you at one table, even the children.
translation.it: Tutti alla stessa tavola. Persino i bambini.

translation.en: Well, I realize it may be unfashionable, but we like each other. [chuckles]
translation.it: So che non si usa più, ma… ci vogliamo bene.

translation.en: Most of the time.
You should join us more often, Your Grace.
translation.it: Dovreste unirvi a noi più spesso.

translation.en: Perhaps when we travel to our country seat.
You would be most welcome.
[Hyacinth] Gregory! Would you stop tossing peas at me?
Those peas were already there. You cannot tell me what to do. I am older.
translation.it: Erano già lì. Non darmi ordini, sono più grande.

translation.en: -And I'm taller. -Children… [chuckles]
He does have a presence about him.
If rakish dukes were one's thing.
-I'm to spar with Jackson himself. -You?
[Colin] Is that envy I detect in your voice?
[Benedict] Judgment, brother. I shall need to witness this.
translation.it: No, era un insulto. Ti voglio proprio vedere.

translation.en: You appear displeased.
Do I?
We find ourselves seated beside each other, Miss Bridgerton.
I'd like to think you're happy about that.
Perhaps, Your Grace, it would be better
if you refrained from thinking about me at all.
translation.it: se smetteste di considerarmi del tutto.

translation.en: It is simply surprising.
Yes! However is it possible for a lady to offer anything other than a smile
translation.it: Certo! Com'è mai possibile che una donna non dispensi sorrisi,

translation.en: whilst seated beside a duke?
…you regarding subjects much too…
-Even one of your reputation. -You are aware of my reputation.
translation.it: - Nonostante la vostra reputazione. - Che ne sapete?

translation.en: I am aware of your friendship with my eldest brother.
translation.it: So della vostra amicizia con mio fratello maggiore.

translation.en: If that were not enough, I am also aware
translation.it: Se non bastasse, so anche ciò che è stato scritto di voi da una certa giornalista.

translation.en: of the things a certain writer has recently written of you.
translation.it: so anche ciò che è stato scritto di voi da una certa giornalista.

translation.en: Presumptuous? Clearly.
Arrogant? Most definitely.
You are a rake… through and through.
translation.it: Siete un libertino. In tutto e per tutto.

translation.en: Tell me I'm wrong.
Who is to refrain from thinking about whom again?
translation.it: Chi deve smettere di considerare chi?

translation.en: [chuckles] I assure you. I am anything but interested in you.
translation.it: Vi assicuro di non aver alcun interesse per voi.

translation.en: -Good. -Quite.
And I anything but interested in you, the eldest sister of my oldest friend,
translation.it: Né io per voi, sorella maggiore del mio più vecchio amico,

translation.en: yet another recent subject of a certain writer.
translation.it: nonché soggetto di una certa giornalista.

translation.en: Chaste, neat, desperate.
-I shall have you know-- -To marry, that is.
translation.it: - State bene a… - Per la mancanza di un marito.

translation.en: Tell me I am wrong.
Hastings, I'm so glad you decided to join us this evening.
translation.it: Hastings, sono davvero contento che ti sia unito a noi.

translation.en: -It was most spontaneous of you. -Not at all.
With Lady Danbury accepting your dear mother's gracious invitation on my behalf…
translation.it: Lady Danbury ha accettato il cortese invito di tua madre a nome mio.

translation.en: Well, however could I have declined?
[Violet] You must stay for dessert. It's gooseberry pie, Your Grace.
translation.it: Dovete fermarvi per il dolce. Crostata di uva spina.

translation.en: Ah! Lovely!
You were a reasonable mother until your eldest daughter came of age.
translation.it: Eravate ragionevole, prima della maggiore età di vostra figlia.

translation.en: -Anthony… -This matchmaking scheme
translation.it: Eravate ragionevole, prima della maggiore età di vostra figlia. Questo incontro, palesemente combinato con Lady Danbury, non funzionerà.

translation.en: you rather transparently concocted with Lady Danbury, it will not work.
translation.it: Questo incontro, palesemente combinato con Lady Danbury, non funzionerà.

translation.en: I can think of worse matches for Daphne than a duke.
translation.it: Un duca mi sembra un buon partito per Daphne.

translation.en: -I believe the two of you to be friends. -We are good friends.
Which is why I know he has absolutely no intention of marrying.
translation.it: Pertanto so benissimo che non intende sposarsi.

translation.en: You must understand all men make that assertion.
-Your… Your father-- -Do not bring Father into this.
translation.it: - Tuo padre… - Non tirate in ballo papà.

translation.en: Even if he were in want of a wife,
translation.it: Anche se fosse in cerca di moglie,

translation.en: you would most certainly not have the duke anywhere near Daphne.
translation.it: non sarebbe l'uomo giusto per Daphne.

translation.en: I am fully subscribed to the belief that reformed rakes make the very best of husbands.
translation.it: Io credo che i libertini ravveduti siano mariti perfetti.

translation.en: He will not make her happy!
Daphne deserves better.
And I know… I know you think you are solving the problem, but you are not.
translation.it: So che credete di risolvere un problema, ma non è così.

translation.en: And that is all I shall say about the matter.
The duke will be joining us as our guest at Vauxhall tomorrow evening.
translation.it: Il duca sarà nostro ospite a Vauxhall, domani sera.

translation.en: I admit, it was not easy to convince him to come.
-You overstep. -She is my eldest daughter.
-Yet she is my responsibility, as are you. -Responsibility?
translation.it: - E mia responsabilità, come voi. - Responsabilità?

translation.en: Do not make this any more difficult than it already is.
I wish to know something, Anthony. Tonight, when you leave this study
translation.it: Dimmi un po', Anthony. Questa sera, quando lascerai lo studio

translation.en: that you continue to keep at your family home,
translation.it: che insisti a tenere nella tua casa natale,

translation.en: are you to return to bachelor lodgings across the square,
translation.it: tornerai nel tuo alloggio sull'altro lato della piazza, o…

translation.en: or will you pay a visit to a certain soprano that you tend to
translation.it: farai visita a una certa soprano

translation.en: in an apartment that you pay for on the other side of town?
translation.it: in un appartamento che le hai preso dall'altro lato della città?

translation.en: Relying on your younger brothers to one day do the job that you cannot.
translation.it: Nella speranza che i tuoi fratelli ricoprano il ruolo che non sai adempiere?

translation.en: You like to speak of responsibility.
My dear son!
Of duty?
Pray tell, what should you know of it?
translation.it: Dimmi un po', tu che ne sai?

translation.en: I sit with her in that drawing room.
translation.it: Ci sto io, in quel salotto con lei.

translation.en: Do you know what I see?
A young woman who is terrified
because she knows what kind of life, what kind of future, awaits her
translation.it: perché sa bene quale vita e quale futuro la aspettino,

translation.en: should you continue to get in her way.
If your father was still here, Daphne would already have been matched.
translation.it: Se ci fosse ancora tuo padre, Daphne avrebbe già un promesso sposo.

translation.en: The man would have made an arrangement with an old friend.
translation.it: Avrebbe fatto un accordo con un amico.

translation.en: The man would have done what was now necessary.
So you must ask yourself
are you merely an older brother,
or are you the man of this house?
I cannot see you anymore.
I… I do not understand.
It is not for you to understand.
I must do what is necessary.
You said you would always protect me.
translation.it: Hai detto che mi avresti protetta.

translation.en: You promised to care for me, my lord.
translation.it: Hai promesso di prenderti cura di me, milord.

translation.en: And now…
What shall I do now?
You shall leave.
[Lady Whistledown] Be it shame or slander, seduction or smear,
translation.it: Che sia vergogna o calunnia, seduzione o oltraggio,

translation.en: there is but one thing
that humbles even the most highly-regarded members of our dear ton…
translation.it: può umiliare anche i più prestigiosi membri dell'alta società:

translation.en: a scandal!
Well, dear reader, it should seem that all of Grosvenor Square
translation.it: Beh, cari lettori, pare che tutta Grosvenor Square

translation.en: has been left to ponder a rather scandalous question, indeed.
translation.it: si stia facendo la stessa, scandalosa domanda.

translation.en: Might one former diamond's recent fall from grace
translation.it: Il recente declino di un certo diamante

translation.en: turn out to be the most damning scandal of all?
translation.it: si rivelerà forse lo scandalo più scabroso di tutti?

translation.en: -I did not know you would be here. -Sorry to disappoint.
translation.it: - Non sapevo fossi qui. - Mi dispiace deluderti.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Have you seen Miss Thompson?
She is ill.
My mama had to stay home with her.
translation.it: Mamma è rimasta a casa con lei.

translation.en: Papa had to chaperone.
I'm quite enjoying the fact that he is here.
translation.it: Sono contenta che ci sia lui.

translation.en: Mama would never allow me to wear a dress like this.
translation.it: Mamma non mi lascerebbe indossare un abito simile.

translation.en: Not, uh, yellow enough, I think. [chuckles]
Mr. Bridgerton. I believe you owe me a dance this evening.
translation.it: Sig. Bridgerton. Credo mi dobbiate un ballo.

translation.en: And I have only one more space remaining on my card at present.
translation.it: E ho un solo posto libero, al momento.

translation.en: How convenient. [gasps]
-Penelope, I did not see you there. -[Penelope gasping]
I'm afraid I cannot offer you that dance, Miss Cowper.
translation.it: Temo di non potervelo offrire, Miss Cowper.

translation.en: I am to escort Miss Featherington to the floor.
translation.it: Stavo già per accompagnare Miss Featherington.

translation.en: The resemblance is remarkable.
You look just like him.
Your father.
[MC] Ladies and gentlemen,
a most extraordinary event is about to take place.
translation.it: sta per avere luogo un evento straordinario.

translation.en: Right this way!
Come! Come!
-Madam. -Yes… Varley?
[MC] It is with great privilege
I present Vauxhall's newest spectacle of illumination.
translation.it: che vi presento le nuove e spettacolari luminarie di Vauxhall.

translation.en: Feast your eyes above
and allow all that is radiant to overwhelm you!
translation.it: e lasciatevi sopraffare da sì tanta lucentezza!

translation.en: Is it not the most bizarre?
[gasps] Look, Brother.
What is it?
Lord Berbrooke's barony is over 200 years old.
translation.it: La baronia di Berbrooke ha più di 200 anni.

translation.en: His lineage is legitimate.
He has had an excellent education, possesses no debts,
never hurt an animal or a woman, and is even a decent shot.
translation.it: mai fatto del male a un animale o a una donna, e ha buona mira.

translation.en: To speak strictly, there is nothing wrong with him.
translation.it: In sintesi, non ha seri difetti.

translation.en: -What should any of this-- -You are to marry him.
-Nigel? -I had to find you a husband, Sister.
Now, be grateful it is done.
translation.it: E l'ho fatto. Dovresti essermene grata.

translation.en: It should be just as easy to fall in love with Lord Berbrooke
translation.it: Non sarà più difficile innamorarti di lui

translation.en: as with anyone else.
I will not hear of this.
You haven't bled.
It's been over a month since your arrival,
translation.it: È passato più di un mese dal tuo arrivo,

translation.en: and you haven't bled.
I suppose I should be happy.
Up until now, I've had no legitimate excuse to dispense with you.
translation.it: Finora non ho avuto scuse valide per liberarmi di te.

translation.en: But when Lord Featherington hears of this,
translation.it: Ma quando lo saprà Lord Featherington,

translation.en: when your own papa hears of this…
-Please… -I suppose I should be happy.
And if it were guaranteed that my own ladies would not be affected
translation.it: E se avessi la certezza che le mie ragazze non saranno macchiate

translation.en: by your revolting recklessness, I would be!
translation.it: dalla tua disgustosa sconsideratezza, lo farei.

translation.en: Do you even know who the father is?
What I know is that you shall never understand.
translation.it: Io so solo che non potreste mai capire.

translation.en: -What was that? -You shall never understand!
translation.it: - Che hai detto? - Non potreste mai capire!

translation.en: Someone like you, living this ridiculously charmed…
translation.it: Una donna come voi, dalla vita così…

translation.en: Did you think I wanted to come here…
to be around people like you, so out of touch, so superior?
translation.it: A sopportare persone così fuori dal mondo, così superiori?

translation.en: Whatever are you doing?
Nigel, not now.
Are we to drop the honorific so soon?
I suppose as your husband--
You will never be my husband. I will never marry you.
translation.it: Non sarai mai mio marito. Non ti sposerò mai.

translation.en: My brother, he… He made a mistake.
Do you think yourself better than me?
[Daphne] It'd be best for you to leave.
translation.it: È meglio che te ne vada.

translation.en: You should be thanking me.
I'm your last hope. No one wants you, Miss Bridgerton.
translation.it: Sono la tua ultima speranza. Non ti vuole nessuno.

translation.en: -[Daphne] What are you doing? -You'll find out.
[Daphne] Stop it!
Let go of me!
Your Grace… I had no intention--
Of knocking the climp flat out?
Well, I must say, I am impressed.
What are you doing out here?
Avoiding certain people.
-People? -Mothers.
They are people, I suppose.
You are coming from the Dark Walk. It is merely a few steps away.
translation.it: Venite dal Sentiero buio, è a pochi passi.

translation.en: -What would you know of the Dark-- -The Dark Walk is merely a few steps away,
translation.it: - Che ne sapete… - Il Sentiero buio è a pochi passi,

translation.en: and I am alone with two men.
translation.it: e io sono sola con due uomini.

translation.en: You are only with one man. The other is--
translation.it: Con uno solo. - L'altro… - Sarei compromessa ugualmente.

translation.en: I'll be compromised just the same.
Do you have any idea what would happen if someone even suggested that I--
translation.it: Sapete cosa succederebbe se anche solo si insinuasse che…

translation.en: I must go.
Marry me, Miss Bridgerton.
Now, as far as proposals go, that may be the least romantic of all.
translation.it: In quanto a proposte, questa è la meno romantica di tutte.

translation.en: I suppose if someone were to find me here, it would be one way out of marrying him.
translation.it: Se qualcuno mi vedesse con voi, almeno non dovrei più sposare lui.

translation.en: You cannot possibly be thinking of marrying him.
If I am unable to secure another offer, there may be no alternative.
translation.it: Senza altre offerte, potrei non avere alternativa.

translation.en: Unlike you, I cannot simply declare I do not wish to marry.
translation.it: A differenza di voi, non posso affermare di non volermi sposare.

translation.en: I do not have such a privilege.
translation.it: Non godo di un simile privilegio.

translation.en: Yes, I was surprised to learn you no longer have a line of suitors around every square in London.
translation.it: Mi stupisce che non abbiate più file di pretendenti in ogni dove.

translation.en: I am in no need of your derision, sir.
translation.it: Non ho bisogno di essere derisa.

translation.en: I do not mock you. I am being sincere.
translation.it: Non vi prendo in giro. Sono sincero.

translation.en: I know of what this Lady Whistledown has written.
translation.it: So cos'ha scritto quella Lady Whistledown.

translation.en: Trust I possess as much contempt for the author as you do.
translation.it: La disprezzo quanto la disprezzate voi.

translation.en: She's all but issued a challenge to London's most ambitious mamas,
translation.it: Ha lanciato una sfida alle madri più ambiziose,

translation.en: encouraging, provoking them to--
Claim you as their prize?
Do not worry, Your Grace.
I believe such a win would be promptly forfeited, indeed.
translation.it: A una simile vittoria si rinuncia facilmente.

translation.en: I must go this way. You, through those trees.
translation.it: Io vado da questa parte. Voi passate da quegli alberi.

translation.en: Perhaps there is an answer…
to our collective Lady Whistledown issue.
translation.it: ai nostri problemi con Lady Whistledown.

translation.en: We could pretend to form an attachment.
[Simon] With you on my arm, the world will believe I've finally found my duchess.
translation.it: Con voi al mio fianco, crederanno abbia trovato la mia duchessa.

translation.en: Every presumptuous mother in town will leave me alone,
translation.it: Ogni madre impertinente mi lascerà in pace

translation.en: and every suitor will be looking at you.
You must know men are always interested in a woman
translation.it: Gli uomini si interessano sempre a una donna

translation.en: when they believe another, particularly a duke,
translation.it: quando credono che un altro, specie un duca,

translation.en: to be interested as well.
You presume Lady Whistledown--
I presume she'll deem us to be what we are.
translation.it: Ci definirà per ciò che siamo.

translation.en: [Simon] Me, unavailable. You… desirable.
Stare into my eyes.
Here.
Closer.
If this is to work, we must appear madly in love.
translation.it: Affinché funzioni, dobbiamo apparire follemente innamorati.

translation.en: -It is an absurd plan. -I find it quite brilliant.
translation.it: - È un piano assurdo. - Io lo trovo geniale.

translation.en: Provided you do not wish to marry me, and I do not wish to marry you,
translation.it: Sempre che voi non vogliate sposare me e io non voglia sposare voi,

translation.en: whatever should you have to lose?
[Lady Whistledown] For those not in attendance at the Vauxhall celebration,
translation.it: Per chi non fosse stato presente ai festeggiamenti di Vauxhall,

translation.en: you missed the most remarkable coup of the season.
translation.it: sappiate di esservi persi il più straordinario colpo della stagione.

translation.en: It appears Miss Daphne Bridgerton has captured the interest
translation.it: Pare che Miss Daphne Bridgerton abbia catturato le attenzioni

translation.en: of the newly returned Duke of Hastings.
How the young miss secured her newfound suitor
translation.it: Come la fanciulla si sia accaparrata questo nuovo pretendente

translation.en: is yet to be determined.
Yet, if anyone shall reveal the circumstances of this match, it is I.
translation.it: Ma se c'è qualcuno che può svelarne i retroscena, quella sono io.

translation.en: Yours truly…
